modShortDescription: Spears now do significantly more damage, making them viable end-game weapons. Additionally, they can be used to butcher meat as well.
modDescription:
Spears now do significantly more damage, making them viable end-game [weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/).

Additionally, they can be used to butcher meat as well.

## Changelog

Updated for A20.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/tree/stable/donovan-betterspears)**
